title: Airline System Backend
description: This project uses a microservice architecture with services for flight search, ticket booking, auth, and reminders.

title: Twitter Backend
description: This project uses a monolithic architecture in which user can post a tweet/image, comment on tweet and like/unlike the tweet along with user authentication using passport js.

title: My Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio website built using ReactJs showcasing my technical skills and professional background.
